title: Student Veterans and the 90-10 Rule
description: In this work, the author provides an overview of for-profit educational institutions in the United States, discusses the 90-10 Rule and its evolution over three decades, and explains why it matters for student veterans.
content:
Photo by adamkaz/Getty Images
Veterans and service members receive education benefits that are administered through the U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) and U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).… [+32100 chars]
